introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Avoqado, a comprehensive restaurant management platform. These Terms and Conditions govern your use of our services. By accessing or using Avoqado, you agree to be bound by these terms.

service.title: Service Description
service.description: Avoqado provides a comprehensive restaurant management platform that includes:

features.pos: Point of Sale (POS) system for order processing

responsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
responsibilities.intro: As a user of Avoqado, you agree to:
responsibilities.account: Maintain accurate account information and secure login credentials
responsibilities.accuracy: Provide accurate business and financial information
responsibilities.compliance: Comply with all applicable laws and regulations in your jurisdiction
responsibilities.security: Implement appropriate security measures to protect customer data
responsibilities.misuse: Not use the service for any illegal or unauthorized purposes

payment.title: Payment Terms
payment.billing: Subscription fees are billed monthly in advance. Payment processing fees may apply for transaction processing.
payment.fees: All fees are non-refundable except as required by law or as specifically stated in these terms.
payment.refunds: Refunds may be provided at our discretion for unused portions of prepaid services.

privacy.title: Data and Privacy
privacy.content: Your privacy is important to us. Our collection and use of personal information is governed by our

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Avoqado provides the service "as is" without warranties. We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of the service.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: Either party may terminate this agreement at any time. Upon termination, your access to the service will cease, and you remain responsible for any outstanding fees.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify you of significant changes via email or through the platform.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.intro: If you have questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us:

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This Privacy Policy describes how Avoqado collects, uses, and protects your information when you use our restaurant management platform.

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.service: Provide and maintain our restaurant management services
usage.support: Provide customer support and technical assistance
usage.improvement: Improve our services and develop new features
usage.compliance: Comply with legal obligations and prevent fraud

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.intro: We may share your information in the following circumstances:
sharing.providers: With trusted service providers who assist in our operations
sharing.legal: When required by law or to protect our rights
sharing.business: In connection with a business transfer or acquisition
sharing.aggregated: Aggregated, non-personally identifiable data for research

security.title: Data Security
security.intro: We implement industry-standard security measures including:
security.encryption: Encryption of data in transit and at rest
security.backups: Secure data backup and recovery procedures

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your information for as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations. You may request deletion of your data subject to certain limitations.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.intro: We use cookies and similar technologies for:

international.title: International Transfers
international.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place for such transfers.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes via email or through our platform.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.intro: For privacy-related questions or requests, contact us:

profitAnalytics.title: Profit Analytics
profitAnalytics.subtitle: Track Avoqado's profit margins and cost management

monthlyAnalysis.title: Monthly Profit Summary
monthlyAnalysis.description: Monthly aggregated profit data by venue

confirmations.deactivate: Are you sure you want to deactivate this cost structure?
confirmations.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this cost structure?

tooltips.arr: Annual Recurring Revenue. Total subscription revenue normalized to a 12â€‘month period.
tooltips.mrr: Monthly Recurring Revenue. Subscription revenue for the current month.
tooltips.netNewArr: New + Expansion â€“ Contraction â€“ Churn for the selected period.
tooltips.nrr: Net Revenue Retention = (Ending ARR + Churn + Contraction) ÷ Starting ARR.
tooltips.churn: Percentage of revenue lost to cancellations/downgrades during the period.
tooltips.signups: New accounts created in the selected period.
tooltips.activation: Percent of new accounts reaching key onboarding milestones.
tooltips.winRate: Closedâ€‘won opportunities ÷ total opportunities within the period.
tooltips.salesCycleDays: Average number of days from opportunity creation to closeâ€‘won.
tooltips.dau: Daily Active Users â€” unique users who engaged with core actions today.
tooltips.mau: Monthly Active Users â€” unique users active in the last 30 days.
tooltips.stickiness: DAU ÷ MAU. Higher means users return more frequently.

activationFunnel.title: Activation Funnel
activationFunnel.tooltip: Dropâ€‘offs from signups to PQLs/SQLs/Won for the period.

cohortRetention.title: Cohort Retention
cohortRetention.tooltip: Share of accounts active by months since signup (rows are cohorts).

charts.mrr12mTooltip: Monthly Recurring Revenue trend for the last 12 months.
charts.dauWindowTooltip: Daily Active Users over the last {{days}} days.
